stepAnswer: typesetting mathematical expressions, e.g. an equation, a set and many more
stepTitle: What is Math mode in Latex used for?
choices: typesetting mathematical expressions, e.g. an equation, a set and many more
to solve an equation, for example 2x = 4 - 3x
to make your document look super cool, because your text becomes cursive
or doing letting the computer do basic algebra for you, e.g. what is 4+2
answerLatex: typesetting mathematical expressions, e.g. an equation, a set and many more
